bio.name: Hudson Uriel
bio.description: Web development specialist and educator by passion. For over 6 years, I have been helping companies and individuals reach their full potential through strategic technology and user-focused design. By combining robust technical support with a human-centered vision, my goal is to create tools that simplify daily life and deliver real results. Ready to turn your project into reality?
bio.aboutMe: A member of the Brazilian Computing Society (SBC) since 2019, I carry a commitment to technical excellence in every project I sign. With a background of over 250 websites and e-commerces developed, I translate my experience as a professor at major institutions in Belo Horizonte into a unique ability to listen, understand, and solve complex challenges with total clarity. My main differentiator? I integrate advanced knowledge in security and hacking to deliver not just a modern design, but a high-performance, bulletproof platform.

webProjects.title: NEW Universo Licitações
webProjects.description: Complete modernization of the brand's digital ecosystem through the development of a new institutional website and internal system optimization for maximum efficiency.

details.fullDescription: Universo Licitações is a consultancy specializing in bidding processes, a sector that demands maximum seriousness and trust. The project involved a deep UI study to create an exclusive, high-performance template, custom-coded in HTML/CSS/JS with an ASP backend. We replaced an obsolete platform with a modern solution that not only improved user navigation but also repositioned the company as a market authority, directly impacting brand value perception and internal process agility through the new optimized system.

webProjects.title: NEW Fortio - Smart Logistics
webProjects.description: Development of a new institutional website focused on audience segmentation and strategic brand repositioning in the logistics market.

details.fullDescription: Fortio is a key link in the Brazilian logistics chain, connecting independent drivers to large shippers through technological solutions. The challenge was to correct the gap between the company's robustness and its obsolete digital presence. I conducted an in-depth interface and typography study based on the brand's visual identity, leading to an authentic advertising campaign that served as the foundation for the new site. The result was a unified brand language: the site now speaks directly to two distinct profiles, transforming the platform into a hub of trust and authority that accelerates new business and partnerships.

webProjects.title: NEW Volts Seguradora
webProjects.description: Creation of Volts' first digital identity, focused on consolidating new brand authority and highlighting services in the insurance sector.

details.fullDescription: Volts Seguradora entered the market with the challenge of establishing trust and solidity from day one. As the company's first institutional site, I developed a high-impact branding project, merging modern UI study with typography that conveys security. The strategic differentiator was the creation of an integrated ad campaign that served as the base for the site’s positioning. Built on WordPress, the new site provides Volts with a proprietary digital presence that positions them as a secure and innovative choice against established competitors.

webProjects.title: NEW Tecnofluid - Industrial E-commerce
webProjects.description: Complete revitalization of the WooCommerce store, focused on optimizing the buyer's journey and strengthening digital authority in the industrial sector.

details.fullDescription: Tecnofluid is a reference in industrial solutions, where technical precision is paramount. The challenge was transforming an obsolete store into a high-performance sales platform. I conducted a UI study focused on information hierarchy and navigation ease for technical products. The project was guided by a strategic campaign that redefined the site's positioning. Using custom WordPress and WooCommerce coding, the result was a fluid and secure shopping experience that elevated Tecnofluid's professionalism and bridged the gap between complex products and client needs.

webProjects.title: NEW RM Polimentos
webProjects.description: Integral reshaping of the brand's digital presence, focused on visual modernization and conversion journey optimization for high-end services.

details.fullDescription: RM Polimentos specializes in the restoration and treatment of noble surfaces, catering to an audience that values aesthetics and durability. The redesign was driven by the need to align the digital image with the sophistication of their marble and granite services. I developed a minimalist and elegant interface where the focus is on visual results, conveying immediate authority. This strategic web design created a luxury digital showcase that significantly raised the perceived value of their services, attracting more qualified leads.

webProjects.title: H2 Finance - Strategic Consulting
webProjects.description: Creation of a high-conversion Landing Page designed for the brand's market launch, focusing on authority and lead capture.

details.fullDescription: H2 Finance offers smart financial solutions for the corporate sector. As the starting point of the brand's digital presence, I developed a strategic landing page that prioritizes value proposition clarity and ease of contact (CTA). The project involved structuring an information architecture focused on UX, ensuring potential clients grasp the company's solidity within seconds. The strategic design gave H2 Finance an image of an established, trustworthy institution, making the landing page the primary gateway for new business generation.
